casebody.data:
CONDEMNATION OF FEE SIMPLE TITLE TO 0.069 ACRES OF VACANT LAND AND CERTAIN EASEMENTS OWNED BY BRANDYWINE VILLAGE ASSOCIATES (UPI # 30-5-226) and Condemnation of Fee Simple Title to 1.93 Acres and a Temporary Grading Easement Over 0.26 Acres of Vacant Land Owned by L & R Partnership and John R. Cropper (UPI #30-2-47) for a Public Street Petition of: Brandywine Village Associates, L & R Partnership, and John R. Cropper No. 581 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 20, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 20th day of February, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
